headline.main: American and Canadian Forces Organize Fight on Propaganda; Committee on Cause and Cure of War Enters Wholly Into War Effort to Counteract False Rumors

lead_paragraph: The National Committee on the Cause and Cure of War is revising its agenda to draw the full force of its membership into the immediate war effort. An emergency council is being appointed to direct these activities and the cooperation of the Department of State has been granted for a new program designed to strengthen the national defense against psychological inroads attempted by foreign agents.
abstract: US and Canadian women's groups Axis propaganda flight described

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: WAR, CAUSE AND CURE OF, NATL COM ON THE
